Function Documentation

int call_postproc ( char *  pppath,
char *  impath,
char *  args,
short  back 
)

Calls a postprox script using a system call

Parameters:
[in] *ppath full path to script or exec. to call
[in] *impath full path to image just written, in case the script requieres this information
[in] *args arguments to be passed to the script or exec.
[in] back flag to tell fi the script should be executed in background or we should wait (block)
